column2:
"Considering all the time I've invested in
watching you, this is the perfect chance
for you to return the favor, don't you think?"

"Ah, what's with that face!
You should accept it with a smile in times like this!"

"Besides, I have a reward ready for you.
So go on, do a lady a favor, already!"

"いつも目をかけてくれてる私に
日頃の感謝の気持ちを表すには
ピッタリの依頼だと思わない？"

"あ、何よその顔！
こういう時は笑顔で引き受けるもんよ！"

"ほら、私からのお礼も
ちゃんと用意してるんだから！
それじゃ、お願いね！"
